Package jwo.utils.xml

A collection of classes for hamdling XML files.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DOMProcessor Handles DOM processing allowing the reading and writing of hierarchical structures as XML files.
 

Package jwo.utils.xml Description

A collection of classes for hamdling XML files.

DOMs (Document Object Models) are used to store entire XML documents in a single data strucure. For very large XML files, sequential processing via SAX classes may be more appropriate.

Related Documentation

  • Java Programming for Spatial Sciences
  • Java and XML resources from Sun Microsystems
Version 2.3, 5th October, 2007
